name: Dodgy
description:
Introduction

Hello everyone, i am very happy to release my first android game  made in Godot Engine. . As this game being my first android game i wanted it to be simple and fun to play. This game is well suited for kids to play and also for adults when they are bored.

The objective of this game is to move the character left to right to avoid the falling crate  and also to see how high you can score.

How to play?

Tilt the device to move the character left and right.

Thanks To,

Freesound: https://freesound.org/
